title: Bandits Kill 20 in Kwara, Village Head, Forest Guards Among Victims as Gov Demands More Troops
description: At least 20 people were killed when bandits attacked Oke-Ode community in Ifelodun LGA of Kwara State, including the village head and forest guards who confronted the attackers.

title: Oke-Ode: Tragedy as Bandits Kill 15 Vigilantes, Hunters in Kwara
description: Bandits invaded Oke-Ode community in Kwara State, killing 15 vigilantes and hunters during the attack on Sunday morning.

title: Bandits kill 10, injure many, kidnap several in Kwara
description: Bandits killed at least 10 people, including a village head, injured many, and kidnapped several others in an attack on Oke-Ode area of Ifelodun LGA in Kwara State.

title: BREAKING: Bandits Abduct Businessman In Midnight Attack On Kwara Community
description: Bandits carried out a midnight attack on a community in Kwara State, abducting a businessman during the raid.

title: NSCDC begins manhunt for attackers of Jigawa poly students
description: The NSCDC has initiated a manhunt for attackers who targeted students of a polytechnic in Jigawa State.
